original_title: Disney Holiday Magic with Samantha Brown
overview: Samantha Brown explores the holiday celebrations at Walt Disney World in Florida. Includes The Osbourne Family Spectacle of Dancing Lights, Epcot's Candlelight Processional, and peeks at several different Disney-owned hotels, including the Disney's Boardwalk Hotel, Disney's Grand Floridian Hotel, and Disney's Wilderness Lodge.
title: Disney Holiday Magic with Samantha Brown
